original_title: Holistic Wellness for the Hip-Hop Generation
overview: With an eye toward empowering the hip-hop generation to live a healthier lifestyle, filmmaker Supa Nova Slom promotes the concept of holistic wellness as a means of combating cancer, arthritis, obesity and other widespread ills. Celebrity subscribers to the philosophy -- including Erykah Badu, Ben Vereen and Common -- also weigh in, sharing tips and offering suggestions for small changes that can have a big effect.
title: Holistic Wellness for the Hip-Hop Generation
